name: Poem
text:
As water over distant shores
In my mind darkness spreads
A nix-hound howls in the darkness
Bringing upon me my dread

Bitter wind brings no relief
Only bits of dust and sand
My house creaks all around me
I ready for the final stand

Nothing can truly be done
For me I know I am lost
When all truly is over
Who shall know the final cost

It is time to end all things
Nothing kind or bright is left
Garish figures drift unwilling
Unable to have one last rest
